events.title: Birth of Nikola Tesla
events.description: Nikola Tesla was born in Smiljan (now in modern-day Croatia) in the then Austro-Hungarian Empire.

events.title: Naturalization of Nikola Tesla
events.description: Nikola Tesla became a naturalized American in 1891.

events.title: Tesla's radio transmission theories
events.description: Tesla's theories about the possible transmission by radio waves go back as far as 1893 and by 1896 he was conducting experiments.

events.title: Construction of Wardenclyffe Tower
events.description: Tesla started on a project to build a gigantic transmitter, known as the Wardenclyffe tower, for trans-Atlantic wireless communications.

events.title: Death of Nikola Tesla
events.description: Tesla collapsed in his hotel room in New York City due to a heart attack and died.

events.title: Restoration of Tesla's patents
events.description: The US Supreme Court restored the prior patents of Nikola Tesla.
